name: Ricky Bobby
quote: I'm not sure what to do with my hands.

name: Virginia Wolf
quote: I can only note that the past is beautiful because one never realises an emotion at the time. It expands later, and we don't have complete emotions about the present, only about the past.

name: Jim Carrey
quote: I just want to be myself.

name: George W. Bush
quote: Families is where our nation finds hope, where wings take dream.

name: Carl Jung
quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.

name: Sigmund Freud
quote: The voice of intellect is a soft one, but it does not rest until it has gained a hearing.

name: Eric Andre
quote: I was a class clown since second grade.

name: Leo Tzu
quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrender.

name: Mitch Hedberg
quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.

name: Robin Williams
quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
